title: Herbal Deodorant — Aluminium-Free
excerpt: A natural aluminium-free deodorant stick made with arrowroot, low baking soda, neem oil and calming essential oils.
content:
## What Is This Herbal Deodorant?
An aluminium-free, absorbent deodorant using arrowroot powder, gentle baking soda (low amount), neem oil, and Pitta-friendly essential oils like vetiver and lemon to control odor without blocking sweat.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Formulated to keep underarms fresh while allowing natural sweating — aligning with Ayurvedic emphasis on natural elimination and balance.

### Key Benefits
- Controls odor without antiperspirant chemicals.
- Uses natural absorbents and antimicrobial neem oil.
- Pitta-friendly scent profile.

## Ingredients
- Arrowroot powder
- Low-dose baking soda
- Neem oil
- Essential oils (lemon, vetiver)

## Usage Instructions
- Apply to clean underarms after showering.
- Reapply as needed.

## Packaging
- Biodegradable push-up tube for minimal waste.

## Safety & Consultation
- Do a patch test; discontinue if irritation occurs (especially with baking soda sensitivity).

## Why Choose This Deodorant?
Natural, breathable, and effective—designed for everyday use without aluminium-based blockers.
